name: Ultimate Hair Heroes Scalp Scrub Shampoo and Deep Conditioning Mask Value Set
about: What it is: An award-winning weekly scalp scrub and intense conditioning full size mask duo to soothe the scalp and care for damaged hair...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Flaky, Dry Scalp.- Oily Scalp..Key Benefits: - Six-time Allure-winning hair mask balances protein and moisture to strengthen and care for dry, damaged hair in as little as ten minutes.- Gentle micro-exfoliating scalp scrub shampoo detoxifies and cleanses to help diminish scalp and hair buildup, flakes, and follicle congestion.- Clean and naturally derived, formulated without sulfates, phthalates, parabens, or silicones..Highlighted Ingredients:- Binchotan Charcoal: Detoxifies hair and scalp by absorbing impurities and buildup..- Plant Proteins: Act similar to keratin by replenishing hair with vital nutrients..- Algae Extract: Provides powerful antioxidant benefits that nourish and protect...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Start with Briogeo’s bestselling scrub shampoo to buff away buildup and flaking for a balanced, refreshed scalp. Follow with the intense conditioning mask to strengthen and repair dry, damaged hair. This weekly mask is scientifically shown to strengthen damaged hair and prevent future breakage...Clinical Results: Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo: In a clinical study using skin hydration measurement instrumentation:.- Clinically shown to reduce up to 82% of dry scalp flaking.- Clinically shown to increase scalp hydration by up to 2 times..In a clinical study, subject’s perception following a single use of the shampoo included:.- 91% of users felt their scalp was more hydrated and moisturized after 1 use..Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask: In a test, results showed:.- Reduces breakage in 10 minutes.- Scientifically shown to strengthen hair up to 2 times after 3 uses..This Set Contains:- 8 oz/ 236 mL Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask.- 8 oz/ 236 mL Scalp Revival™ Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Micro-exfoliating Shampoo:.-Use weekly in place of shampoo..-Apply to wet hair..-Vigorously massage into the scalp..-Rinse clean..-For best results, apply an intense conditioning mask or your favorite Briogeo conditioner on mid-lengths to ends after cleansing...Deep Conditioning Mask:.-Use weekly in place of conditioner..-After shampooing, massage into hair, ensuring even application. .-Leave on for at least 10 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

reviews.review_title: Great kit for moisturizing and product build up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try a shampoo more focused on the scalp and exfoliation. I will get build up in my scalp from other hair products that weighs my hair down and it make it look oily. This shampoo focuses on exfoliation and removes product buildup with ease! I also have colored my hair in the past, so it tends to be on the dry side. The mask was so nourishing and moisturizing, even after just one use!

reviews.review_title: The best duo for dry scalp!

The 'Don't Despair, Repair' mask works perfectly for this, leaving my hair hydrated and smooth. This combo is unbeatable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

Overall if your hair is in need of nourishing and you’re tired of having an itchy scalp I recommend you to get this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The BRIOGEO Scalp Revival Charcoal + Coconut Oil Micro-Exfoliating Shampoo and the Don't Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Mask have both made a huge difference in my hair. The exfoliating shampoo cleans my hair well, getting rid of buildup and leaving it feeling fresh and clean without being dry, thanks to the coconut oil. When I put on the deep conditioning mask, which fixes damage and adds a lot of moisture, my hair feels soft, smooth, and refreshed. The mask is thick but not heavy, and it uses natural ingredients like argan oil and B-vitamins to heal my hair. Every time I use this pair, my hair feels lighter, stronger, and better. Great box with these duo.

I am also impressed with the charcoal scalp treatment and shampoo that deeply cleanse my scalp leaving it feeling soothed and purified. I have even found that  I can go a couple extra days now in between shampoos! Another great Brigeo haircare kit for gifting during the holidays!

It would make a great gift as well!

reviews.review_title: Great gift for this upcoming holiday season!

But, this is an amazing value and a great set for any haircare lover!! Such a great value as well! Will make a great gift this upcoming holiday season!
